price: ሰውንም ሁሉ በራሪውን (ሥራውን) በአንገቱ አስያዝነው፡፡ ለእርሱም በትንሣኤ ቀን የተዘረጋ ኾኖ የሚያገኘው የኾነን መጽሐፍ እናወጣለታለን፡፡
arabic: وَكُلَّ إِنسَٰنٍ أَلۡزَمۡنَٰهُ طَٰٓئِرَهُۥ فِي عُنُقِهِۦۖ وَنُخۡرِجُ لَهُۥ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ كِتَٰبٗا يَلۡقَىٰهُ مَنشُورًا

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wakulla insānin alzamnāhu ṭāirahu fī ʿunuqihi wanukh'riju lahu yawma al-qiyāmati kitāban yalqāhu manshūran
